characterDescription:
The Herdazian general is a member of Amaram's army.
He takes Sheler captive and tells him that he has three choices by which to die. First, he can choose the sword.

characterDetails.Appearance: He has dark brown skin the color of weathered stone, and there is a hint of grey in the thin mustache on his upper lip. He has a missing tooth and a flat nose.
characterDetails.Personality: He is harsh in punishment, but tricks those he punishes into thinking he's capable of seemingly incapable things.
characterDetails.Characteristics:
He is not a lighteyes.
He demonstrates that even when manacled, he can easily break free of the restraints.*
characterDetails.Notes: *After handing the manacles to Officer Jerono (who the general thinks is a ridiculous little man), when Jerono tells his general that he thought he'd fail them for sure, the general replies that it doesn't matter how good the lock is if the cuffs are loose.
